definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_wakes_up</field><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:BlockX</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:BlockY</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:BlockZ</field></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:SleepTrigerred</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.BED</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="world_entity_inrange"><field name="entity">EntityItem</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
